text.0: bring song and hymn to agni asuraslayer enlightener of all and thoughtbestower.
text.1: like an oblation on the grass to please him i bring this to vaiśvānara hymninspirer.
text.2: thou with thy flame o agni brightly glowing hast at thy birth filled full the earth and heaven.
text.3: tiou with thy might vaiśvānara jātavedas settest the gods free frodi the curse that bound them.
text.4: agni when born thou lookedst on all creatures like a brisk herdsman moving round his cattle.
text.5: the path to prayer vaiśvānara thou foundest ye gods preserve us evermore with blessings.
